LL: [Presented to Wm. S. Mount by the artist, Jan. 15, 1851]
signed: LR: [one sitting by C. L. Elliott of Henry J. Brent]
text: Conservation of this picture was made possible by a generous contribution from Douglas and Mary Olson through the Art Champions program.
title: Unfinished Portrait of Henry J. Brent, 1811-1850
